question: What is the warranty period?
answer: All Gtech products come with a 2-year warranty and 30-day money-back guarantee.

question: How do I track my order?
answer: You can track your order by visiting our website and using the 'Track My Order' feature, or contact our support team.

question: What is the delivery time?
answer: We offer free delivery on all orders. Delivery times vary by location, typically 3-5 business days.

question: How do I return a product?
answer: You can return any product within 30 days of purchase. Contact our support team at support@gtech.co.uk or call 08000 308 794 for assistance.

question: Do you offer customer support?
answer: Yes! Our support team is available to help. Contact us at support@gtech.co.uk or call 08000 308 794.
